text: The Yemen Football Association () is the governing body of football in Yemen. The organisation joined FIFA in 1980 as the Yemen Arab Republic, commonly known as North Yemen. In 2005 the YFA was suspended by FIFA due to serious interference by political authorities in the internal affairs of the association, violating Article 17 of the FIFA Statutes. ==Former Presidents== * Ali Al Ashwal 1987-2000 * Ahmed Saleh Al-Eissi 2000-2006 * Hamid Al-Shaibani 2006- ==References== ==External links== * Yemen Football Association at the FIFA website. * Yemen Football Association at AFC site * Official website Football Category:Football in Yemen Category:Sports organizations established in 1962 Yemen
title: Yemen Football Association
